tweet: Wishing everyone a happy Thanksgiving! Thank you for the opportunity to serve as your representative in Congress. #OH16 pic.twitter.com/0pX7zVyPQK

This week we learned @SpeakerPelosi likely won’t bring #USMCA up for a vote before the end of the year. This is disappointing news, but I plan to keep up the fight to get this deal passed for Northeast Ohio farmers and manufactures. My #WeeklyRundown video here. pic.twitter.com/yjlM43LiJ0

Today I met with local business owners to discuss how small businesses are propelling our regional economy forward. Many of these businesses benefit from the small business tax deduction, which is why I recently cosponsored a bill to make this dedication permanent in the House. pic.twitter.com/yhk5Mrrc1D

Visited Spray Products in Medina today - a family owned and operated business expanding here in #OH16. Growing and maintaining talent here in Northeast Ohio is one of my top priorities and it’s great to see this being done successfully in Medina. pic.twitter.com/5NzMSySiae

Disappointing to see @SpeakerPelosi walk back her comments about passing #USMCA this year. USMCA means more jobs, higher wages and a stronger economy. We must put partisan politics aside, put our constituents and communities first, and pass USMCA into law. https://www.politico.com/news/2019/11/21/pelosi-doubt-usmca-passing-072459?fbclid=IwAR2GthhFlnmTiharc7atM0WYr5XGSGmyfxk__VX8XnTKe_3rnymI2AEQfj4 …

The Olmsted Falls community recently lost a hero in Brett Wilson, a Columbia Township firefighter who died while attempting to save others. I gave a speech on the floor of the U.S. House of Representatives recently to honor his memory. Watch here: pic.twitter.com/jwnAedhfaS

My IOGAN Act with @RepHaleyStevens to combat dangerous deepfakes was just introduced in the Senate by @SenCortezMasto & @JerryMoran. This bill is critical to stopping deepfakes aimed at scamming the American public and threatening national security.  https://www.cortezmasto.senate.gov/news/press-releases/cortez-masto-moran-introduce-legislation-to_combat-deepfakes …

A vote on USMCA should be the easiest vote we take in Congress this cycle. This deal will raise all boats with a $68.2 billion increase to GDP and 176,000 new jobs in Ohio's strongest industries. My op-ed in @thepostnews here: http://www.thepostnewspapers.com/columns/guest-column/article_377de27a-6234-5f2a-87fa-abb3af1f468e.html …

Manufacturers and farmers across Northeast Ohio rely on our trading partners to reach more customers and create more jobs. USMCA will expand markets & give our local economy a chance to grow. Congress needs to pass #USMCAnow https://www.wdtn.com/news/washington-dc/u-s-farmers-could-get-holiday-gift-from-d-c-pelosi-hopes-to-pass-usmca-in-2019/ …

The situation in Hong Kong is continuing to escalate as China works to suppress democracy. Meanwhile, the World Bank provides China with loans they shouldn't qualify for on the backs of our taxpayer dollars. This is wrong. My bill to address this here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=156 …

Combed through the @LibraryCongress history books with Peyton Manning to learn about how Congress changed @NFL history. Check out a clip from this week's Peyton's Places episode here. #NFL100 https://www.espn.com.au/video/clip/_/id/28097442 …
This week I had two bills pass committee, one pass the House and another hit the hopper. Learn about them all in this week’s #WeeklyRundown video here: https://youtu.be/b5xJX8LvcuY
Great to see you all today! Enjoyed having the chance to talk with you while you're in Washington, D.C. Enjoy the rest of your trip! https://twitter.com/CoachDies/status/1195364218146639873 …

Today for #TVT (Thank-a-Vet Thursday) I am saying thank you to Joe Rodgers, a @USArmy veteran from #Wadsworth who has served our community in a number of ways, including as commander for @AmericanLegion Post 170. Watch Joe tell his story here: pic.twitter.com/PVCU1oaFMQ

A second bill of mine also passed @housesciencegop this morning - the Election Technology Research Act authorizes important research to improve and secure voting systems across the country. Learn more on my website here:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=159 … pic.twitter.com/7f7ki2JeVW

Too many times I have met with a group of constituents to discuss a trade or veteran related policy issue, but the biggest problem on their mind has been the growing suicide threat. It is time we reverse that trend. Proud to work on this bill with @RepBenMcAdams on this bill.

My bill to combat rising suicide rates across the nation just passed @housesciencegop with unanimous support. We all know we have a mental health crisis in this country, but for too many in #OH16 the suicide problem is a personal one. Learn more here:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=158 … pic.twitter.com/YRCWTHmPZs

Israel is unbelievably innovative as a country. Putting our skill sets together to develop new technology that will help keep both our nations safe makes sense as we move forward in a world of new threats related to the technological era.

I introduced a new bill this week with @RepJoshG to boost cooperation between the US and Israel in developing technology to counter killer drones amid the ongoing drone war in the middle east. Learn more about the bill here:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=157 … pic.twitter.com/sUDlGmFj2E

.@ChallengeAmerica hosted Makers for Veterans this past weekend at @wearesteds. Ten teams created real solutions for everyday problems our #NortheastOhio veterans are facing. Proud to see this level of innovation happening in real time, all in the name of our vets. pic.twitter.com/S60MSYsIhq

I cannot and will not stand by and allow my constituents’ taxpayer money to go to China while they continue to abuse this nation and suppress democracy as we have seen in Hong Kong. More on the Accountability for World Bank Loans to China Act here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=156 …

The US can't afford to give @WorldBank a blank check as long as they continue to make cloudy investments and misuse taxpayer dollars by providing loans to countries that do not and should not qualify for them. My new bill supports efforts to graduate China from the IBRD program.

The @WorldBank continues to provide loans to China under the IBRD program for middle-income developing countries despite China's gross national income per capita far exceeding the program's threshold. This has to end. My new bill here:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=156 …

One of the most important visits I made on Veterans' Day was to the Cleveland Veterans' Affairs Medical Center. I walked the halls and visited the floors that did not receive many visitors. It was an honor to visit those who could not make it out to a #VeteransDay event. pic.twitter.com/skUrGjHVQA

Yesterday I sat down with 21 members of the #OH16 veteran community to discuss veterans benefits, PTSD and suicide rates, alternative therapy programs and connecting veterans with veteran services. What are your thoughts on how our nation can better serve our #veterans? pic.twitter.com/uHiDJujUqu

Proud to share that my battlefield cross bill passed the U.S. House of Representatives today with unanimous support. Watch my remarks on the House floor below and learn more about the bill on my website here:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=155 … pic.twitter.com/U8v2301b42

Joe's flags are a reminder to remember our men and women who have so admirably served today and everyday. So, for our great veterans on behalf of a grateful community, please know that we love and appreciate you today, on this #VeteransDay, and always.

Thank you to the City of North Royalton for inviting me to speak at the North Royalton Family YMCA flag dedication and ceremony honoring #NorthRoyalton #Veterans. It was great to see @BurdickFlags, who created the custom flag that was dedicated this morning. pic.twitter.com/fxvZts79O3
Thank you to all those who have worn the cloth of our nation. You are our heroes. #VeteransDay pic.twitter.com/7uTfSsQzGd
Happy birthday to the @USMC!  Semper Fi. pic.twitter.com/KF7M92YdCg

I was back home in Northeast Ohio this week to visit local businesses, talk to our students and researchers and promote the resources available to veterans in our community. Catch up on what I've been working on in my #WeeklyRundown video here: https://youtu.be/GnmJAt5odIU

Happening TOMORROW: My office will have an informational table at a Senior Benefits Fair, co-sponsored by @BrennanForParma  and @ParmaLibrary. Details in the article here. https://www.cleveland.com/community/2019/11/parma-city-council-president-schedules-senior-benefits-fair-for-nov-9.html …

Great Q&A with employees at Synchony Financial in Canton yesterday. @synchrony is one of the largest employers in my district and has over 934 employees on site. Grateful for the opportunity to tour their facility and answer questions on @FinancialCmte and my time in Congress. pic.twitter.com/fzLL9HSXAS

As the first Hispanic American from Ohio to serve in Congress, it was an honor for me to speak to the Hispanic/Latino student group @WalshUniversity. I also had the pleasure to sit down with the University's new President Dr. Collins. pic.twitter.com/smwoEgEwTp

If you or someone you know in #OH16 needs help with a VA case or getting connected to veterans services, please contact my office! Learn more about how we can help at  http://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/services  or call my Canton office at 330-599-7037. https://twitter.com/oliviafecteau/status/1192555883739389952 …

Stopped by the Stark County Veteran’s Resource Fair hosted by the SAM Center to talk about the work my office does to help #OH16 vets with federal resources, medal requests and more. Check out our full range of services on my website here:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/services/  pic.twitter.com/1TaqOk4uUV
Thank you so much for having me! https://twitter.com/WalshUniversity/status/1192527299473752065 …

Out of 660+ applications for this type of funding, our request was one of only 10% to be granted. That is a remarkable statistic and a testament to all the hard work put in by the entire #StarkCounty community including Commissioner Richard Regula and State Senator Kirk Schuring.

$18 million in @USDOT funding for U.S. Route 30 is a major victory for #OH16 and #StarkCounty! Ensuring we have the infrastructure to support local industries will give Northeast Ohio the framework we need to move our economy forward. Learn more here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=153 …

Great news - @USDOT has granted $18 MILLION to complete the U.S. Route 30 expansion project in Stark County! Our community has been pushing for this funding for the better part of 3 decades, and I am incredibly proud that my office could help get this across the finish line.

.@CantonChmbr held #StarkForum today to discuss new polling on community issues like quality of life and jobs/talent attraction. The data shows Stark Co. residents are more positive than ever about the local economy and job availability. This is great news for Northeast Ohio! pic.twitter.com/Nm1eLiHV6O

Great visit to Heidelberg Distributing Company's 140,000 square-foot warehouse in Independence to see how the family owned business works to distribute beer, wine, spirits and non-alcoholic beverages to retailers across OH and KY. Thanks to everyone who made the visit possible! pic.twitter.com/zSO7dd7u6g

Many thanks to @cwru Interactive Commons for the chance to experience the #hololens headset. It was fascinating experience to visualize medical anatomy and galaxies in this mixed reality. Just one of the ways #Northeast Ohio is leading the way in innovation. #Interactivecommons pic.twitter.com/YRvrkBfcG9

A new March of Dimes report came out today showing infant mortality continues to be a major problem in Northeast Ohio. We must take steps to address this problem, which is why I introduced a bill w/ @RepSteveStivers, @RepTimRyan  and @RepUnderwood:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=140 … https://twitter.com/WEWS/status/1191491564658397184 …
ICYMI - last week my Battlefield Cross bill passed @HouseVetAffairs with unanimous support. Check out my testimony from a few weeks ago here. pic.twitter.com/QrtOwbAFl8

This week my battlefield cross bill passed out of committee, and I introduced a new bill to name the #NorthCanton post office after Marine Lance Corporal Annie Dryden who died while serving our country in Iraq. My #WeeklyRundown here: https://youtu.be/mbMLrM9_zy4

Lance Cpl. Dryden was a 2004 graduate of @GlenOakEagles and enlisted in the @USMC in 2007. I can think of no better way to honor her legacy than by naming our hard-fought post office in her honor. More on my website here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=147 …

Honored to introduce a bill to rename the new #NorthCanton post office after Marine Lance Corporal Stacy 'Annie' Dryden who died in 2008 while serving our country in Iraq. This would be the first post office named of a female #veteran in Ohio and one of only 6 nationwide.
